category.title: Category
category.description: Manage your categories here. You can add, edit, or delete categories as needed.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Category
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
deleteDialog.permanentRemove: This action will permanently remove this category from the system. This cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.hasProducts: This category has {count} products associated with it. You need to reassign or delete those products before deleting this category.
deleteDialog.warningMessage: Please be careful, this operation cannot be rolled back.
deleteDialog.cannotDeleteMessage: This category has {count} products associated with it. Reassign or delete these products first.
deleteDialog.successMessage: The category "{name}" has been deleted successfully

formDialog.createDescription: Add a new category to your product catalog
